snippet: Rick Pitino said his son Richard was leaving his staff at Louisville to become Florida International’s coach.
abstract: Richard Pitino, son of Louisville men's basketball head coach Rick Pitino, is leaving the Louisville staff to become head coach at Florida International, where he will replace Isiah Thomas.
lead_paragraph: Rick Pitino said his son Richard was leaving his staff at Louisville to become Florida International’s coach.

headline.main: Pitino Says His Son Will Replace Thomas
headline.print_headline: Pitino Says His Son Will Replace Thomas
